CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Quote_line__r.SBQQ__Product__r.Family ,'Mobile Subscription (Corporate)'), ISPICKVAL( Quote_line__r.SBQQ__Product__r.Family ,'Mobile Subscription'), ISPICKVAL( Quote_line__r.SBQQ__Product__r.Family ,'M2M Subscription'), ISPICKVAL( Quote_line__r.SBQQ__Product__r.Family ,'Touchpoint') , ISPICKVAL( Quote_line__r.SBQQ__Product__r.Family ,'Functions TPX') , ISPICKVAL( Quote_line__r.SBQQ__Product__r.Family ,'Mobile Subscription TPX'), CONTAINS(Product_Code__c,'12111')), true,false)
CustomField.label: Show On Onboarding Page
